sentence.Network_en: The elevator creaked to a halt at the ground floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 电梯嘎吱一声停在了一层。

sentence.Network_en: The blast caused extensive damage, shattering the ground-floor windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 爆炸造成了巨大的破坏，震碎了一楼的窗户。

sentence.Network_en: She showed him around the ground floor of the empty house.
sentence.Network_cn: 她带他参观了这处空房子的底楼。
